des: "I first tried this delicious recipe at a meal prepared by my husband's cousin. It has since become a family favorite.  Not only does it taste incredible, but it is simple to prepare!"
ins:
Stir water, Italian-style salad dressing, and soy sauce together in a slow cooker. Add the pork roast. Sprinkle green onion and garlic over the pork.
Cook on Low for 8 to 9 hours.
